revision.text: ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|y-peg|3s|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-gan|conclusive imperfective}} {{nv-link-to-root|-GAN|wither}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she/it is [[dry up|drying up]], [[wither#Verb|withering]] # he/she/it is becoming very [[skinny]] ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|conclusive|∅/si}}. {{nv-verbtable|IMPERFECTIVE |yishgan|yiigan|deiigan|nigan|wohgan|daahgan|yigan|daagan|jigan|dajigan}} {{nv-verbtable|PERFECTIVE |ségan|siigan|dasiigan|sínígan|soogan|dasoogan|sigan|daazgan|jizgan|dajizgan}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|nv|yiłgan|pos=transitive||he/she/it is drying it up}}
